author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Victory Giant Technology HuiZhou to pay 2017 dividend on March 16
text:
March 12(Reuters) - Victory Giant Technology HuiZhou Co Ltd
* Says it will pay a cash dividend of 3 yuan for every 10 shares (before tax) and use additional paid-in capital to distribute 8 new shares for every 10 shares for 2017, to shareholders of record on March 15
* Says the companyâ€™s shares will be traded ex-right and ex-dividend on March 16 and the dividend will be paid on March 16
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/Gbm4Hj
